Articles.Content: Greetings from Aus, I saw this game on a game show here called Good Game about a week ago, been mucking about with it ever since having a ball. I used to mod The Sims 2 back in the day a bit (wasn't very good at it but it was fun) Ive been reading the mod guides on here and playing around with the .cfg files. Ive got blender and I have had a play with it (never used it before). I just want to say, Im not a gamer, I seldom play them, but Kerbal is the best game Ive played like ever
Let me be the first to welcome you to the KSP forums! Remember, everything can be solved with MOAR BOOSTERZ!

Welcome to the forums! Hope you have fun both playing the game and tinkering with the mods.

If you run into any problems, the people who frequent our How To and Addon Development sections will likely be able to answer any questions you may have. I'd also advise you to take a look at the Drawing Board (link in my sig) for some resources that can help you learn more about the game, as well as any modding resources that are in their respective forum sections.

Happy landings!
Welcome to Kerbal. I'm new to this as well, it is a truly amazing game.... nothing else out there like it! Happy engineering from Manchester UK
Thanks all for the welcome, Ive made some progress on my modding adventure, wife keeps telling me to get off the computer though.
